price: 35.Usuk (Nabii Huud kinnuk) Sin xagnisaa? Diggah isin rabteeniih burtaay bululte lafoofi takken waqdi sinni magooqak nuwwuk awqettoonu iyyaanamal, isin woh mannal kaak nummassaanaa? Keenik iyyen.
arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ إِذَا مِتُّمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ayaʿidukum annakum idhā mittum wakuntum turāban waʿiẓāman annakum mukh'rajūna
